Html:
Hi, I keep getting strange results with the new Rawr v.0.20 Version .

The optimizer tells me to max out mastery to around 20-22 mastery and ignore Hit ( 13% ) with decent 359 gear ??

Also there seems to be a bug with the volcanic potion in the sequence reconstruction Rawr used them at 3.15.9 sek and  at 3.50.4 timecode ( they only lasts for 25 sek if I am right ). I checked the volcanic potion box under buffs ( not the double potion thingy ) with the volcanic potion box under options / spells and buffs ( why are there two boxes for it anyways ?? )

Don't try to use sequence reconstruction for Arcane. Ever since they added Mana Adept it's practically impossible to get a perfect linear reconstruction. If you really want to you can try to use the advanced solver, but I wouldn't advise it unless you're very interested in theorycrafting optimal cooldown stacking.

For your mastery problem I haven't seen anything like that. You'll have to post an issue with your character xml.
